summary: This document is a certification of good standing for the corporation Southern Trust Company, Inc., formerly known as Financial Informatics, Inc. It confirms that the corporation filed Articles of Incorporation and is authorized to conduct business in the Virgin Islands.
keyFacts: Southern Trust Company, Inc. was formerly known as Financial Informatics, Inc.
The corporation filed Articles of Incorporation on November 18, 2011.
A Certificate of Incorporation was issued on December 8, 2011.
The corporation is considered to be in good standing.
